title: Guardians of the Kingdom
description: Guardians of the Kingdom is an action-packed fantasy game that takes you on an epic journey to defend the realm from the dragon army of eternity. Strategically deploy your heroes in this Tower Defense adventure, showcasing your tactical brilliance to claim victory. Upgrade your heroes to bolster their strength and face waves of relentless enemies. Unite identical heroes to enhance their powers, and wield the power to control the battlefield. Prepare for an immersive and thrilling battle to safeguard the Kingdom!
